title: 1/9/18 - What's Paining Oprah?
description:
​Hour 1 
Vindication for Cliven Bundy...didn’t Ronald Reagan warn us about this? ...despite judge’s dismissal, still a troubling story...escalated way out of control...government off the rails ...Ranking Glenn's 2018 predictions, top to bottom, vote @ GlennBeck.com…Stu says Glenn is being really optimistic…A new understanding of freedom is coming...Principles over Power?...Millennials are not going to church...Democrats’ impeachment implications in 2018?

 

Hour 2 
'Diversity', the end all, be all? ...former Google employee sues for discrimination...Fun with defining Fascism? ...Heartbreak in Michigan, family murder suicide? ...Lies and Obituaries of the New York Times? ...Remembering the greatness of Thomas S. Monson? ...Glenn's 18th Wedding Anniversary, Dinner and a movie ...more laughs per minute then any other movie? 
 
Hour 3 
The Hypocrisy of Oprah Winfrey ... ‘they just have to die’... ‘my Vi Jay Jay Is Panin’...Flashback to 1999: Oprah for Vice President? ...Samsung launches its new 146-inch TV called 'The Wall' ...TV technology at its finest ...California woman raised by Christian foster parents will auction off her virginity?...Bunny Ranch commission seems steep...Stu reviews the iPhone X...how did he ever survive before facial recognition? ...Joe Arpaio for U.S. Senate?
The Glenn Beck Program with Glenn Beck and Stu Burguiere, Weekdays 9am–12pm ET on TheBlaze Radio
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
